# rtx_ipsec_transport (Resource)

Manages IPsec transport mode configuration on RTX routers. Used for L2TP over IPsec and other transport mode VPN configurations.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Map L2TP traffic (UDP 1701) to IPsec tunnel
resource "rtx_ipsec_transport" "l2tp" {
  transport_id = 1
  tunnel_id    = 101
  protocol     = "udp"
  port         = 1701
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `port` (Number) Port number (1-65535). Common value is 1701 for L2TP.
- `transport_id` (Number) Transport ID (1-6000).
- `tunnel_id` (Number) Associated IPsec tunnel ID (1-6000).

### Optional

- `protocol` (String) Transport protocol: 'udp' or 'tcp'.
